step_feedback.feedback: Great job stretching your arm overhead. Keep feeling that gentle resistance to help with lymph flow.
Your arm is well-positioned overhead. Ensure your palm and fingers are opening wide.
You're making a good fist and tightening your muscles as you inhale. Keep up the strong effort!
You are opening your hand and relaxing as you exhale. Visualize the fluid moving out of your arm.

exercise_summary: You did a great job with the overhead pumping exercise! Remember to stretch your arm up, open your hand wide, and then make a fist while breathing in. As you breathe out, relax your hand. This helps move fluid effectively.
